lang.string: Hello astronaut A3008, welcome to the Mercury space station.
I will explain your mission. You must find the dissonate objects from different worlds.
I hope you don't get a bout of insanity like the former astronaut.
He left the objects in different worlds and deactivated the portals that lead to them.
As these objects do not belong to their worlds they are causing spatial chaos.
Therefore, your mission is to go to those worlds and bring back the dissonant objects.
Bring back dissonant objects.
Oh! You have found an energy crystal.
With this you will be able to activate a portal. Now find where to place the crystal.
Great! You have activated a portal.
Go through it and bring back the dissonant object.
You have already placed the energy crystal.
It seems that when interacting with these buttons the platforms move.
No wonder here lived very ingenious beings.
You are already carrying an object in your hand.
Good! You've already restored some of that space chaos.
Now continue with the mission.
Welcome to Amateratsu!
A neon fantasy world, its inhabitants were ingenious beings.
Good luck in the search for the dissonant object.
Welcome to Blossom!
In this world, vegetation predominates and each plant has a function.
The inhabitants were not very developed but controlled the vegetation.
Enough chitchat. Good luck in your search for the dissonant object.
It seems that this plant acts like a balloon and when it bursts, it activates a gigantic plant that emits light.
Something seems to be missing.
Congratulations, you have found the dissonant object.
Now go back to the base and place it in the dissonance room.
This is the dissonance room.
This is where you should place the dissonant objects, once you have found them.
Great! You have brought back all the dissonant objects.
Come here to talk to me to finish the mission.
You made it Astronaut 3008. You have successfully completed the mission.
I will contact Earth to let them know that the mission has been completed.
You can now return home. Thank you for your services Astronaut 3008.
I enjoyed the company of this Astronaut.
I will return to leave the dissonant objects in other worlds.
So Earth will bring me a new Astronaut.
Place here the dissonant object of Amateratsu.
Place here the dissonant object of Blossom.
Options

Sounds FX
Achievements

Exit
Back

Restart
Main Menu

Delete
Drone
Talk to the Drone 3 times
Botanist
Interact with 10 Blossom plants
Dimensional Travel
Pass through the portals 6 times
Curious
Interacts with 5 base objects
Speed Runner
Pass the game in less than 5 minutes
Chaos Restored
Complete the mission
Feeling nostalgic?
The former astronaut spent a lot of time with that junk.
This is found in a certain Mushroom Kingdom.
Don't eat it!
Don't touch it! It's a laser sword.
You can cause a disaster.
It is said that if you collect 7 balls, a dragon appears and grants you a wish.
If you eat it you will obtain great power.
But you will no longer be able to swim in the water.
